body .swissArmyInput input:focus, body .swissArmyInput select:focus, body .swissArmyInput textarea:focus
{
    outline: none !important;
}

body .swissArmyInput input:not([type='image']), body .swissArmyInput textarea {
    box-sizing: content-box !important
}

body .swissArmyInput
{
	display: block;
	float: none !important;
	line-height: 1 !important;
	margin: 0 !important;
	padding: 0 !important;
	border: 0 !important;
	font-size: 100% !important;
	font: inherit !important;
	vertical-align: baseline !important;
	font-family: 'Lucida Grande', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', Tahoma, sans-serif !important;
}

body .swissArmyInput a
{
	text-decoration: none !important
}

body .swissArmyInput table
{
	border-collapse: collapse !important;
	border-spacing: 0 !important;
}

body .swissArmyInput dl, body .swissArmyInput dt, body .swissArmyInput dd, body .swissArmyInput table tbody, body .swissArmyInput tfoot, body .swissArmyInput thead, body .swissArmyInput tr, body .swissArmyInput th, body .swissArmyInput td
{
	margin: 0 !important;
	padding: 0 !important;
	border: 0 !important;
	font-size: 100% !important;
	font: inherit !important;
	vertical-align: baseline !important;
}

{
	color: #66666b !important;
	list-style-type: none !important;
	padding: 2px 16px 4px 16px !important;
	min-height: 24px !important;
	width: auto !important;
	display: block !important;
	float: none !important;
	margin: 0 0 0 0 !important;
	height: auto !important;
	border-bottom: solid 8px transparent !important;
	text-align: left !important;
	padding-top: 3px !important;
	padding-bottom: 4px !important;
	font-family: 'Lucida Grande', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', Tahoma, sans-serif !important;
	font-size: 13px !important;
	line-height: 16px !important;
	font-weight: 300 !important;
}

	line-height: 24px !important;

	height: 24px !important;

	width: 266px !important;
	font-weight: 600 !important;
	letter-spacing: -0.5px !important;
}

}

}

	-moz-background-clip   : padding !important;
	-webkit-background-clip: padding-box !important;
	background-clip        : padding-box !important;
	background-color: #e4e4e4 !important;
	background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, color-stop(20%, #f4f4f4), color-stop(50%, #f0f0f0), color-stop(52%, #e8e8e8), color-stop(100%, #eeeeee)) !important;
	background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #f4f4f4 20%, #f0f0f0 50%, #e8e8e8 52%, #eeeeee 100%) !important;
	background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #f4f4f4 20%, #f0f0f0 50%, #e8e8e8 52%, #eeeeee 100%) !important;
	background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #f4f4f4 20%, #f0f0f0 50%, #e8e8e8 52%, #eeeeee 100%) !important;
	background-image: linear-gradient(#f4f4f4 20%, #f0f0f0 50%, #e8e8e8 52%, #eeeeee 100%) !important;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 2px #ffffff inset, 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.05) !important;
	-moz-box-shadow   : 0 0 2px #ffffff inset, 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.05) !important;
	box-shadow        : 0 0 2px #ffffff inset, 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.05) !important;
	color: #333 !important;
	border: 1px solid #aaaaaa !important;
	line-height: 13px !important;
	padding: 3px 20px 3px 5px !important;
	margin: 3px 0 3px 5px !important;
	position: relative !important;
	cursor: default !important;
}

{
	background-color: #e4e4e4 !important;
